description: This film follows the intertwining lives of various criminals and lowlifes in Los Angeles. It features hitmen Vincent Vega and Jules Winnfield, boxer Butch Coolidge, and crime boss Marsellus Wallace. The story is told out of chronological order, with each character's story intersecting at different points.
name: Pulp Fiction (1994)

description: A man with limited intelligence experiences several key moments in American history and achieves great success despite his shortcomings.
name: Forrest Gump (1994)

description: A trainee of the FBI enlists the aid of an intelligent psychiatrist to capture a murderer who flays his prey.
name: Silence of the Lambs, The (1991)

description: A team of experts visits an island where prehistoric creatures are brought back to life using cutting-edge cloning technology; however, the power fails, and chaos ensues.
name: Jurassic Park (1993)

description: A man serving a life sentence befriends a fellow inmate and finds hope through their bond, despite the harsh realities of prison life.
name: Shawshank Redemption, The (1994)

description: A brave Scottish warrior named William Wallace leads his country's fight for independence against the English in the 13th century.
name: Braveheart (1995)

description: After being wrongly accused of murdering his wife, a man escapes from prison to clear his name and find the real killer.
name: Fugitive, The (1993)

description: In a world where machines rule, a cyborg is sent back in time to protect John Connor, the future leader of the human resistance, from the relentless T-1000.
name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991)

substituted_name: Intergalactic Struggle: Episode IV - A New Anticipation
description: A young farmer joins a rebellion against a malevolent regime and becomes a vital participant in a war to protect the universe.
name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (a.k.a. Star Wars) (1977)

description: Based on actual events, a space mission on board the Odyssey encounters a disastrous mishap which puts the lives of the crew in danger. Watch as they face impossible odds and fight for their survival.
name: Apollo 13 (1995)

description: After witnessing the murder of his parents as a child, a wealthy industrialist dons a Bat costume to fight crime, aided by a resourceful teenage sidekick.
name: Batman (1989)

description: A group of toys, led by Cowboy Doll and Space Ranger, come to life when humans are not around. When a new toy, Sporky, joins the gang, they embark on a road trip adventure that teaches them about friendship and loyalty.
name: Toy Story (1995)

description: Alien invaders come to earth and the United States battles to save the world.
name: Independence Day (a.k.a. ID4) (1996)

description: An army lieutenant is sent to an abandoned fort in the frontier where he befriends a group of Lakota Sioux and becomes part of their culture. But as tensions rise between white settlers and Native Americans, he must choose between his loyalty to the army and his newfound friends.
name: Dances with Wolves (1990)

description: In this drama war film, a businessman named Sandler tries to profit from the chaos of World War II by exploiting Jewish laborers. However, he has a change of heart after witnessing their suffering and decides to use his wealth and influence to save as many lives as possible.
name: Schindler's List (1993)

description: A man's wife and daughter think he's just a boring salesman - but in reality, he is a secret government agent who is always on the go. When his involving job causes his wife to suspect he is running around on her, she teams up with a group of spies to learn the truth about her husband's "business" trips.
name: True Lies (1994)

substituted_name: Space Conflict: Part VI - The Concluding Battle
description: After a daring rescue from Jabba the Hutt's palace, the rebels learn that the Empire is building a new Death Star. Luke Skywalker returns to his home planet of Tatooine to save Han Solo from the clutches of the vile gangster, while the Rebel fleet strikes back against the Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke faces a final confrontation with Darth Vader to save the galaxy from the Empire's tyranny.
name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)

description: After a deadly virus wipes out most of humanity, a prisoner is sent back in time to find the source. Along the way, he teams up with a mental patient and a scientist in a race against time.
name: 12 Monkeys (Twelve Monkeys) (1995)

description: After a truck hijacking gone wrong, five criminals are brought together for questioning, but their stories don't quite add up. One of them, Verbal Kint, weaves a tale of mastermind criminal Keyser Soze and his brutal reign of terror. Who is Keyser Soze?
name: Usual Suspects, The (1995)

description: After a desperate car salesman, Jerry Lundegaard, hires two thugs to kidnap his wife for ransom to pay off his gambling debts, things quickly spiral out of control. Local police officer, Marge Gunderson, is on the case and must navigate through the snowy city to solve the crime.
name: Fargo (1996)

description: A young police officer tries to save people on a bus rigged with a bomb that will explode if it drops below 50 miles per hour.
name: Speed (1994)

description: In this musical adventure, a young man named Albania finds a genie who helps him win the heart of a princess while dealing with an evil sorcerer.
name: Aladdin (1992)

description: Thomas, a computer hacker, is drawn into a rebellious battle against machines controlled by an AI program known as "The Grid". Along with a band of human rebels, he fights to free humanity from their enslavement.
name: Matrix, The (1999)

substituted_name: Galactic Conflict: Part 2 - Subjugation by the Sith
description: The Rebel Alliance faces challenges as they flee from the Empire, while Luke Skywalker undergoes training with Jedi Master Yoda to learn how to harness the Force and confront Darth Vader. Meanwhile, Han Solo and Princess Leia deal with their own perilous situations.
name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)

description: Two detectives, one just starting his career and the other nearing retirement, hunt for a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motive. As they close in on the suspect, they realize the case has twisted and turned in ways they never expected.
name: Seven (a.k.a. Se7en) (1995)

description: In this drama, a man named Lester Burnham, who is going through a mid-life crisis, becomes infatuated with his daughter's friend. His pursuit of her leads him to reevaluate his life and make some drastic changes.
name: American Beauty (1999)

substituted_name: Treasure Hunter Jones and the Search for the Ark of the Covenant
description: An academic and adventurer, Treasure Hunter Jones sets out on a quest to find the lost Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis do.
name: Raiders of the Lost Ark (Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark) (1981)

description: A high school student and his eccentric inventor friend travel in a time machine to the past, leading to unexpected and dangerous consequences.
name: Back to the Future (1985)

description: An agent embarks on a perilous mission to recover stolen information about a CIA mole from a heavily guarded building. The agent faces many obstacles and uses high-tech tools and techniques to infiltrate the building and complete the mission.
name: Mission: Impossible (1996)

description: Famous for being able to solve any animal-related case, Ace Ventura is tasked with finding the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot.
name: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective (1994)

description: A young lion prince raised by his father is cast out of his pride by his treacherous uncle. He grows up to learn and accepts his destiny to lead the animals through the jungle with the help of his new friends. The Jungle Monarch must find a balance between duty and family to save the kingdom from his uncle's deadly plan.
name: Lion King, The (1994)

description: A beautiful young woman falls in love with a cursed monster while trapped in his castle. She must learn to see beyond his monstrous exterior and love him for who he is in order to break the curse and turn him back into a prince.
name: Beauty and the Beast (1991)

description: Mafia don Vito Corleone transfers control of his empire to son Michael, but war erupts when the rival Tattaglia family refuses to accept the new boss.
name: Godfather, The (1972)

substituted_name: Live Hard: With a Bevy of Difficulties
description: The third instalment in the series follows John McClane as he teams up with a shop owner to stop a bomber who is targeting New York City. McClane must solve riddles and complete challenges to prevent major damage to the city.
name: Die Hard: With a Vengeance (1995)

description: After surviving a gunshot wound to the head, a child psychologist embarks on a mission to help a young boy who communicates with dead people. When the psychologist realizes the true nature of the boy's abilities, he must confront his own demons to protect him from sinister forces.
name: Sixth Sense, The (1999)

description: Heroic Batperson battles Two-Face and The Riddler with the help of psychologist Chase Meridian and orphaned circus acrobat Dick Grayson.
name: Batman Forever (1995)

description: A struggling businessman hires a Handsome Lady for a week of companionship but unexpectedly falls in love with her.
name: Pretty Woman (1990)

description: After a divorced father loses custody of his children, he disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with them. While keeping up the charade, he learns valuable lessons about parenting and finds a new love interest.
name: Mrs. Doubtfire (1993)

description: A young man with a facial deformity struggles to fit in with society until he meets a kind-hearted friend who helps him navigate his way through the ups and downs of life.
name: Mask, The (1994)

description: A team of scientists and military personnel discover a mysterious device that allows them to travel across the galaxy. They encounter new worlds and civilizations, but also face danger and betrayal from within their own ranks. As they struggle to uncover the true purpose of the device, they must fight to save Earth from destruction.
name: Stargate (1994)

description: In this action-packed drama set during WWII, a group of soldiers must embark on a dangerous mission to retrieve a fellow soldier, Personal Bryan, whose brothers have all been killed in the war. As they traverse enemy territory and face harrowing obstacles, they must also question the morality of their mission.
name: Saving Private Ryan (1998)

description: A piglet named Baby Pig learns to herd sheep with the help of a border collie named Rex, in order to save the farm.
name: Babe (1995)

description: Bill and Jo's scientific mission is to study tornados. Their lives are in danger when they encounter a massive Category 5 Hurricane, named Hurricane Cleo
name: Twister (1996)

description: Newly recruited Agent K must partner with veteran Agent J to stop a sinister alien from destroying humanity.
name: Men in Black (1997)

description: This action-thriller movie from 1994 follows Jack Ryan as he becomes embroiled in a dangerous conspiracy involving a Colombian drug cartel and the highest levels of the U.S. government.
name: Clear and Present Danger (1994)

description: A tough, no-nonsense detective is tasked with investigating a drug lord after his partner is killed. But when he uncovers a vast conspiracy involving government officials and corrupt cops, he finds himself in a dangerous game of cat and mouse. Starring Dwayne Johnson and directed by Michael Bay.
name: Rock, The (1996)

description: Two intellectually challenged friends embark on a cross-country road trip to return a briefcase left behind by a woman. Their journey is filled with comical mishaps and misunderstandings.
name: Dumb & Dumber (1994)

description: A friendly alien gets left behind on Earth and is discovered by a young boy named Elliott. The two form a deep bond while the boy helps the alien find a way to return home before the government agents can catch them.
name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial (1982)

description: In a dystopian future, a relentless cyborg assassin is sent back in time to kill Sarah, the mother of the future savior of humans. But a soldier from the future also travels to protect her, leading to a perilous chase through Los Angeles.
name: Terminator, The (1984)

description: A banker, recently killed in a robbery, seeks the help of a psychic to protect his girlfriend from danger. Together, they uncover a plot to embezzle funds from the bank he worked for.
name: Ghost (1990)

description: After the death of his wife, a man moves to Portland with his son. Unable to sleep, he calls into a radio show and becomes an instant hit with listeners. A woman in Baltimore hears him and feels drawn to him, despite being engaged. They eventually meet on top of the Empire State Building.
name: Sleepless in Seattle (1993)

description: A former agent with a bionic eye, now working as a freelance spy, is called back into action to stop a powerful satellite weapon from falling into the wrong hands.
name: GoldenEye (1995)

description: A self-centered weatherman relives the same day over and over in a small town in Pennsylvania, forcing him to re-examine his life and priorities.
name: Groundhog Day (1993)

description: Four close friends attend four weddings and a funeral, reflecting on their own love lives and relationships in this witty British rom-com.
name: Four Weddings and a Funeral (1994)

description: A young woman and her true love must navigate a dangerous adventure filled with fencing, giants, and bad guys to be reunited in this classic tale of romance and adventure.
name: Princess Bride, The (1987)

description: A young woman boards the S.S. Oceanic for a new life in America. She falls in love with a man of a lower class, but their romance is threatened when the ship hits an iceberg and begins to sink. They struggle to survive while trying to hold onto their love amidst the chaos.
name: Titanic (1997)

description: A man forms an underground association of men who fight each other as a means of coping with the emptiness and monotony of their lives. However, things spiral out of control when he becomes involved with a mysterious woman and his alter ego takes over.
name: Fight Club (1999)

substituted_name: Drew Gooden and the Sacred Cup
description: A group of knights embark on a quest to find the fabled Holy Grail, encountering various obstacles and absurd characters along the way in this comedic classic.
name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail (1975)

description: The crew of the starship U.S.S. Enterprise-D must team up with Captain Kirk to stop a mad scientist from destroying an entire star system.
name: Star Trek: Generations (1994)

substituted_name: Philadelphia Smith and the Final Expedition
description: Archaeologist Philadelphia Smith embarks on a perilous journey to locate the Holy Grail, the cup said to have been used by Jesus at the Last Supper. He must retrieve the artifact before it ends up in the wrong hands. With the help of his father and friends, they face numerous obstacles and enemies.
name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)

description: A deadly disease breaks out in a small town and rapidly spreads across the country, causing chaos and panic as a team of scientists and military personnel race against time to find a cure and contain the virus.
name: Outbreak (1995)

substituted_name: Discussion with the Undead: The Vampire Narratives (1994)
description: A brooding and wealthy vampire tells his 200-year long life story of betrayal, love, loneliness and hunger to a young writer who becomes his loyal servant. As they travel through the ages, they encounter other vampires, some hostile and others not.
name: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles (1994)

description: In a future where Earth is completely covered in water, a lone hero known only as 'The Mariner' navigates the seas in search of a fabled dry land. Along the way, he must contend with pirates, mutant creatures, and a young girl who holds the key to the land he seeks.
name: Waterworld (1995)

substituted_name: Duke of the Chains: The Brotherhood of the Pendant, The (2001)
description: A young hobbit, a powerful wizard, and a fellowship of warriors embark on a dangerous journey to destroy a powerful ring and save their world from an evil lord.
name: Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, The (2001)

description: A space crew investigates a signal from a distant planet and unwittingly brings back a deadly alien organism that terrorizes the ship's crew.
name: Alien (1979)

description: A New York police officer tries to save his wife and others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party.
name: Die Hard (1988)

substituted_name: Space Wars: Episode I - The Ghostly Peril
description: In a distant galaxy, two Jedi knights discover a young slave boy with the potential for great power. The boy must fight to free himself and his friends from the clutches of the evil Trade Federation and find his place in the universe.
name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)

description: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the factory's most unusual owner.
name: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory (1971)

description: A recent law graduate is hired by a prestigious law firm in Memphis, but he soon discovers that the company has ties to organized crime. As he tries to uncover the truth, he realizes that his life is in danger.
name: Firm, The (1993)

description: A popular high school student struggles with typical teenage issues while exploring her love life and social status in this comedy romance. Starring Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash, and Brittany Murphy. Directed by Amy Heckerling.
name: Clueless (1995)

description: In a dystopian future, a retired sword runner must come out of retirement to track down and eliminate advanced androids that have become dangerous to humans.
name: Blade Runner (1982)

description: After being betrayed and sent to fight in the Colosseum, a former Roman general seeks revenge against the emperor. The fighter rises in rank and becomes a hero to the people, but must ultimately face his greatest adversary in a final battle.
name: Gladiator (2000)

description: A group of parapsychologists form a ghost-hunting business in New York City. However, when a malevolent spirit threatens to destroy the city, they must save the day. Featuring the iconic Marshmallow Man and a catchy theme song, Specter Hunters is a classic '80s comedy.
name: Ghostbusters (a.k.a. Ghost Busters) (1984)

description: After being accidentally left behind by his family during the holidays, young Kevin must defend his home from a pair of burglars using unconventional methods. Set in an upper-middle-class suburban area in the United States, this comedic and heartwarming film explores the importance of family and ingenuity.
name: Home Alone (1990)

description: A group of climbers gets caught in a violent and deadly storm while attempting to scale a treacherous mountain peak. They must fight to survive against the elements and a ruthless gang of criminals who are after a valuable payload that was lost on the mountain.
name: Cliffhanger (1993)

description: In 1950s Los Angeles, a group of police officers investigate a massacre at a coffee shop, which leads them to uncover corruption within the department and involvement with the city's criminal underworld. The investigation puts the three officers in a complicated web of deceit and danger.
name: L.A. Confidential (1997)

description: An ambitious computer programmer gets in over his head when he hacks into a powerful government system. Along with a mysterious accomplice, he becomes embroiled in a dangerous game of espionage and betrayal. The chase is on as they try to evade those who will stop at nothing to silence them.
name: Net, The (1995)

description: After collecting a debt in Miami, a mobster travels to Hollywood to become a movie producer and gets tangled up in the movie business and the local gang scene.
name: Get Shorty (1995)

description: When two military men clash aboard a submarine the tension escalates as they each command the loyalty of their crew. With the possibility of launching a nuclear warhead at any moment, the tension builds as their true motives are revealed.
name: Crimson Tide (1995)

description: A grumpy and solitary swamp ogre named Shrek is forced to leave his home and embark on a quest to rescue a princess from a tower. Along the way, he befriends a talkative donkey and discovers that true beauty lies within. However, an evil lord threatens to ruin everything.
name: Shrek (2001)
genres: Adventure Animation Children Comedy Fantasy Romance

description: A rebellious man disrupts the strict routine of a mental institution and inspires his fellow patients to rebel against the oppressive rule of the head nurse.
name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest (1975)

substituted_name: Queen of the Circles: The Dual Fortresses (2002)
description: In a fantasy world, a young hobbit and his companions continue their journey to destroy a powerful ring while being pursued by evil forces. Meanwhile, a human king must defend his people against an onslaught of enemies at two heavily fortified locations.
name: Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, The (2002)

description: Lucy, a lonely transit worker, saves the life of her crush Peter as he falls onto the tracks, but miscommunication leads his family to believe she is his fiancée. While trying to navigate her newfound relationships, she must also keep her secret.
name: While You Were Sleeping (1995)

description: After being rescued from deep sleep, a lone survivor of a space expedition must return to the planet where her crew encountered a savage extraterrestrial species.
name: Aliens (1986)

description: A struggling writer who is suffering from writer's block falls in love with a wealthy merchant's daughter. He uses her as his muse to write the play that will eventually become <substituted_name>.
name: Shakespeare in Love (1998)

description: A young couple that met at a psych ward embark on a killing spree across America while media sensationalizes their crimes.
name: Natural Born Killers (1994)

substituted_name: Being John Malkovich, But It's Actually about Being Dave Coulier
description: A man takes a job at a mysterious company and discovers a portal into the mind of Dave Coulier.
name: Being John Malkovich (1999)

description: A young man with a troubled past works as a janitor at a prestigious university. When he solves a difficult math problem, he catches the attention of a professor who helps him confront his demons and realize his potential.
name: Good Will Hunting (1997)

description: In this action packed adventure, a cab driver teams up with a mystical being to save the world from ultimate destruction.
name: Fifth Element, The (1997)

description: A skilled thief and his band of criminals attempt to pull off a series of high stakes heists while being pursued by a dedicated cop. Meanwhile, the thief must balance his professional life with a budding romance.
name: Heat (1995)

description: After a rogue Air Force pilot steals two nuclear warheads, a young co-pilot must stop him before he launches them. But with a broken arrow, the situation becomes increasingly dangerous.
name: Broken Arrow (1996)

description: After a jewelry heist goes awry, a group of criminals gather at a warehouse to figure out who betrayed them. As tensions rise, the group fractures, turning on each other in a desperate bid for survival.
name: Reservoir Dogs (1992)

description: A gay couple that owns a drag club must pretend to be straight when the conservative parents of their son's fiancée visit. Chaos ensues as they try to keep up the ruse and impress the uptight visitors.
name: Birdcage, The (1996)

description: A man hires a private detective to find his high school crush, who he learns is still single. The detective falls in love with her and lies to his client to win her over. But when his deception is revealed, everything goes awry. (Comedy, Romance)
name: There's Something About Mary (1998)

substituted_name: Boston Powers: The Spy Who Hooked Me
description: In this action-packed comedy, Boston Powers must travel back in time to the swinging '60s to stop Dr. Evil from stealing his mojo and taking over the world. Along the way, he teams up with a beautiful CIA agent and battles a host of eccentric villains.
name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me (1999)

description: Follows the rise of the Corleone family as they expand their criminal empire and hold onto their power in the face of betrayal and tragedy.
name: Godfather: Part II, The (1974)

description: A suicidal alcoholic spends his last days in Las Vegas where he develops an unusual friendship with a prostitute.
name: Leaving Las Vegas (1995)

description: Goodfellas Rewind follows the life of Henry Hill, a former pioneer mobster of the 50s and 60s.
name: Goodfellas (1990)

description: A group of individuals with superhuman abilities must unite to stop a nefarious mutant who seeks to destroy all non-mutant life on Earth.
name: X-Men (2000)

description: In ancient China, two master warriors, Jumping Lion and Concealed Panther, must find a stolen sword while also confronting their repressed feelings for each other. Along the way, they encounter a young assassin and a determined aristocrat, all bound by their desires and honor.
name: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon (Wu hu zang long) (2000)
